name: Senior Data Engineer / Data Architect
description:
What will you do
— Move data pipelines to Airflow with the final destination in PostgreSQL and ClickHouse
— Design DWH architecture and integrations with other internal services
— Create ELT/ELT pipelines for transferring data to DWH and mentor teammates
— Facilitate and explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability (monitoring of ETLs, datasets checks, etc.)

What are we looking for
— Experience in the field 5+ years
— Background as a DevOps or Software Engineer
— Familiarity with data warehousing ETL Solutions, and data pipeline architecture
— Proficiency in SQL
— Previous experience with AirFlow, ClickHouse
— Experience working with REST APIs
— Experience with performance tuning of long-running SQL queries
— Basic knowledge of statistics (averages, medians...)
— English - upper intermediate

Our tech stack
— ClickHouse and Postgres as DWH solution
— Airflow for ETL/ELT pipelines

Bonus points
— Experience with BI tools is a strong advantage
— Desired future position
— Data Architect
— Data model development skill
— Familiar with Algorithms & Data Structures
— Have the desire to dive deeply into Web3
— Proficiency in Python

Why us
— Intense-yet-kind culture
— Strong engineering team
— Competitive pay and equity
— Lots of vacations & flexible working hours
— Part-time or delayed start is ok
— Remote or office in one of our hubs
— Mental healthcare, hobby compensation
— Education and conference reimbursement
